mapper.sql: select ID AS id, discount_product_id AS discountProductId, merchant_id AS merchantId, name AS name, serial_number AS serialNumber, icon AS icon, openid AS openid, is_immediate AS isImmediate, discount AS discount, is_shared AS isShared, use_msg AS useMsg, limit_msg AS limitMsg, expired_time AS expiredTime, store_name AS storeName, state AS state, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from coupon
